CustomField.description: Give info if the planning of invoice has been generated for the condition. If the user will chek, automatic planning of invoicing will be generated based on the condition invoicing criteria
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Give info if the planning of invoice has been generated for the condition. If the user will chek, automatic planning of invoicing will be generated based on the condition invoicing criteria
CustomField.label: Invoicing Plan Generated
